languages.text: "Далеко не каждый бунт требует внимания Арбитес. Пока я оцениваю обстановку — если ради расследования надо подавить мятеж, мы вмешаемся. Но лучше бы губернатору навести порядок. В конце концов, не для красоты он тут сидит".

"Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."
languages.original_text: "Далеко не каждый бунт требует внимания Арбитес. Пока я оцениваю обстановку — если ради расследования надо подавить мятеж, мы вмешаемся. Но лучше бы губернатору навести порядок. В конце концов, не для красоты он тут сидит".

traits.locale_text: "Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here just to sit and look pretty."

"Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here just to sit and look pretty."

"Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here just to sit and look pretty."

"Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."

"Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."

languages.text: "Nicht jeder Aufstand erfordert das Eingreifen des Adeptus Arbites. Im Moment beurteile ich lediglich die Lage, und wenn wir zu dem Ergebnis kommen, dass die Rebellion niedergeschlagen werden muss, werden wir eingreifen. Allerdings täte der Gouverneur gut daran, dieses Chaos zu beenden. Er ist schließlich nicht nur hier, um hübsch auszusehen."
languages.original_text: "Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht jeder Aufstand erfordert das Eingreifen des Adeptus Arbites. Im Moment beurteile ich lediglich die Lage, und wenn wir zu dem Ergebnis kommen, dass die Rebellion niedergeschlagen werden muss, werden wir eingreifen. Allerdings täte der Gouverneur gut daran, dieses Chaos zu beenden. Er ist schließlich nicht nur hier, um hübsch auszusehen."

languages.text: « Toutes les insurrections ne nécessitent pas l'intervention de l'Adeptus Arbites. Pour l'instant, je ne fais qu'évaluer la situation. Mais si notre enquête nécessite d'écraser la rébellion, nous le ferons sans hésiter. Néanmoins, le gouverneur ferait mieux de faire cesser ces troubles. Il n'est pas ici pour se pomponner et se tourner les pouces. »
languages.original_text: "Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes les insurrections ne nécessitent pas l'intervention de l'Adeptus Arbites. Pour l'instant, je ne fais qu'évaluer la situation. Mais si notre enquête nécessite d'écraser la rébellion, nous le ferons sans hésiter. Néanmoins, le gouverneur ferait mieux de faire cesser ces troubles. Il n'est pas ici pour se pomponner et se tourner les pouces. »

languages.text: «No todas las revueltas precisan la intervención del Adeptus Arbites. Por ahora me limito a evaluar la situación y, si nuestra investigación requiere que sofoquemos el alzamiento, entonces entraremos en acción. Aun así, el propio gobernador debería haber puesto fin al caos. No se le asignó el cargo únicamente para hacer bonito».
languages.original_text: "Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."

traits.locale_text: «No todas las revueltas precisan la intervención del Adeptus Arbites. Por ahora me limito a evaluar la situación y, si nuestra investigación requiere que sofoquemos el alzamiento, entonces entraremos en acción. Aun así, el propio gobernador debería haber puesto fin al caos. No se le asignó el cargo únicamente para hacer bonito».

languages.text: “并非所有暴乱都需要法务部出面采取行动。目前，我仅仅是在评估形势。只有调查结果表明这场叛乱需要镇压，我们才会接手。话虽如此，暴乱最好还是由总督亲自出面制止，毕竟总督这个职位可不是吃闲饭的。”
languages.original_text: "Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."

traits.locale_text: “并非所有暴乱都需要法务部出面采取行动。目前，我仅仅是在评估形势。只有调查结果表明这场叛乱需要镇压，我们才会接手。话虽如此，暴乱最好还是由总督亲自出面制止，毕竟总督这个职位可不是吃闲饭的。”

languages.text: 「すべての反乱が、高等裁定局の介入を必要とするわけではありません。現時点では、状況を把握している段階にすぎません。調査の結果、反乱を鎮圧する必要があるとなれば、介入します。とはいえ、この騒乱を止めるのは総督の務めです。彼はお飾りでそこに座ってるわけではないですから」
languages.original_text: "Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての反乱が、高等裁定局の介入を必要とするわけではありません。現時点では、状況を把握している段階にすぎません。調査の結果、反乱を鎮圧する必要があるとなれば、介入します。とはいえ、この騒乱を止めるのは総督の務めです。彼はお飾りでそこに座ってるわけではないですから」

languages.text: "Her ayaklanma, Adeptus Arbites'in müdahalesini gerektirmez. Şimdilik durumu değerlendiriyorum. Olur da soruşturmamız isyanın ortadan kaldırılmasını gerektirir, işte o zaman bir müdahalede bulunuruz. Her hâlükârda valinin bu kargaşaya artık bir son vermesi gerekiyor. Onun işi, oturup aynada kendine hayran olmak değil."
languages.original_text: "Not every uprising demands action by the Adeptus Arbites. For now, I am simply assessing the situation, and if our investigation requires that the rebellion be crushed, then we will intervene. Still, the governor had best put a stop to this bedlam. He is not here to just sit and look pretty."
